docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 25 -- The United States Information Agency reported today a "mounting tempo" of Communist activity in Latin America, lavishly financed by Moscow.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 25 -- The United States Information Agency reported today a "mounting tempo" of Communist activity in Latin America, lavishly financed by Moscow.
docs.abstract: USIA repts 'mounting' Communist activity financed by USSR despite party membership drop since World War II; cites visits to USSR bloc by Latin Amers; gives data on 9 countries

headline.main: QUICKER RED PACE IN AMERICAS SEEN; U.S. Agency Says Communists Are Increasing Activity and Tightening Kremlin Link

docs.snippet: Considerable strength and activity in the British pound sterling highlighted an otherwise dull foreign exchange market during the past week.

docs.snippet: Landlocked in the heart of South America, the Republic of Paraguay is the least accessible, the poorest and one of the most charming of the Latin lands. Its people are goodhumored but quick-tempered; they have intense political loyalties and great...
docs.lead_paragraph: Landlocked in the heart of South America, the Republic of Paraguay is the least accessible, the poorest and one of the most charming of the Latin lands. Its people are goodhumored but quick-tempered; they have intense political loyalties and great physical courage.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., May 6 -- Since the end of World War II, the nearest approach in history to a complete global census has been provided through population counts in fifty-four separate areas, the United Nations May Bulletin of Statistics...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., May 6 -- Since the end of World War II, the nearest approach in history to a complete global census has been provided through population counts in fifty-four separate areas, the United Nations May Bulletin of Statistics discloses.
docs.abstract: UN Statistics Bulletin lists 59% of world population tabulated since World War II; cites areas for which census exists or is lacking

headline.main: U. N. CENSUS BULLETIN LISTS 59% OF WORLD

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: An easier undertone for the British pound sterling marked the trading in foreign exchanges this last week. Canadian dollar recorded only minor fluctuations as the volume of business dropped off considerably.
docs.lead_paragraph: An easier undertone for the British pound sterling marked the trading in foreign exchanges this last week. Canadian dollar recorded only minor fluctuations as the volume of business dropped off considerably.

docs.snippet: LANDOVER, Md., May 13 (UP) -- Betty Jameson carded a one- under-par 71 at Prince Georges Golf and Country Club today to take the first-day lead in the seventy-two-hole, $5,000 women's National Capital open golf tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: LANDOVER, Md., May 13 (UP) -- Betty Jameson carded a one- under-par 71 at Prince Georges Golf and Country Club today to take the first-day lead in the seventy-two-hole, $5,000 women's National Capital open golf tournament.

headline.main: BETTY JAMESON SETS PACE ON 7 Mrs. Zaharias Second, Two Shots Back, in Opening Round of Capital Golf

docs.snippet: LANDOVER, Md., May 14 (AP) -- Mrs. Mildred (Babe) Zaharias took over the half-way lead in the $5,000 women's National Capital open by a five-stroke margin today by adding a 74 to her opening 73 for a 147 total.
docs.lead_paragraph: LANDOVER, Md., May 14 (AP) -- Mrs. Mildred (Babe) Zaharias took over the half-way lead in the $5,000 women's National Capital open by a five-stroke margin today by adding a 74 to her opening 73 for a 147 total.

headline.main: MRS. ZAHARIAS' 147 PACES GOLF FIELD; She Gains 5-Stroke Lead in National Capital Tourney With Second-Round 74

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, May 15 -- Land-locked Paraguay celebrated Wednesday the formal start of ship service between this capital, which is near the heart of the continent, and European ports.
docs.lead_paragraph: ASUNCION, Paraguay, May 15 -- Land-locked Paraguay celebrated Wednesday the formal start of ship service between this capital, which is near the heart of the continent, and European ports.
docs.abstract: Paraguay hails new Dutch service linking Eur and Asuncion

headline.main: PARAGUAY OPENS LANE TO EUROPE; Dutch-Built Riverboats Make Fortnightly Run in 3 Stages -- Boon to Economy
